verses.verse: And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, that they take <WH3947> for me an offering <WH8641>: of every man <WH376> whose heart <WH3820> maketh him willing <WH5068> ye shall take <WH3947> my offering <WH8641>.
And this is the offering <WH8641> which ye shall take <WH3947> of them <WH2091>: gold, and silver <WH3701>, and brass <WH5178>,
and blue <WH8504>, and purple <WH713>, and scarlet <WH8438>, and fine linen <WH8336>, and goats <WH5795>' hair,
and rams <WH352>' skins <WH5785> dyed red <WH119>, and <WH8476> sealskins <WH5785>, and acacia <WH7848> wood <WH6086>,
oil <WH8081> for the light <WH3974>, spices <WH1314> for the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081>, and for the sweet <WH5561> incense <WH7004>,
onyx <WH7718> stones <WH68>, and stones <WH68> to be set <WH4394>, for the ephod <WH646>, and for the breastplate <WH2833>.
And let them make <WH6213> me a sanctuary <WH4720>, that I may dwell <WH7931> among them <WH8432>.
According to all that I show <WH7200> thee <WH8403>, the pattern of the tabernacle <WH4908>, and the pattern <WH8403> of all the furniture <WH3627> thereof <WH6213>, even so shall ye make it.

And they shall make <WH6213> an ark <WH727> of acacia <WH7848> wood <WH6086>: two cubits <WH520> and a half <WH2677> shall be the length <WH753> thereof <WH520>, and a cubit and a half <WH2677> the breadth <WH7341> thereof <WH520>, and a cubit and a half <WH2677> the height thereof <WH6967>.

And thou shalt overlay <WH6823> it with pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>, within <WH1004> and without <WH2351> shalt thou overlay <WH6823> it <WH6213>, and shalt make upon it a crown <WH2213> of gold <WH2091> round about <WH5439>.

And thou shalt cast <WH3332> four <WH702> rings <WH2885> of gold <WH2091> for it <WH5414>, and put them in the four <WH702> feet <WH6471> thereof <WH8147>; and two rings <WH2885> shall be on the one <WH259> side <WH6763> of it <WH8147>, and two rings <WH2885> on the other side of it <WH8145>.
And thou shalt make <WH6213> staves <WH905> of acacia <WH7848> wood <WH6086>, and overlay <WH6823> them with gold <WH2091>.
And thou shalt put <WH935> the staves <WH905> into the rings <WH2885> on the sides <WH6763> of the ark <WH727>, wherewith to bear <WH5375> the ark <WH727>.
The staves <WH905> shall be <WH1961> in the rings <WH2885> of the ark <WH727>: they shall not be taken from it <WH5493>.
And thou shalt put <WH5414> into the ark <WH727> the testimony <WH5715> which I shall give thee <WH5414>.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> a mercy-seat <WH3727> of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>: two cubits <WH520> and a half <WH2677> shall be the length <WH753> thereof <WH520>, and a cubit and a half <WH2677> the breadth thereof <WH7341>.
And thou shalt make <WH6213> two <WH8147> cherubim <WH3742> of gold <WH2091>; of beaten work <WH4749> shalt thou make <WH6213> them <WH8147>, at the two ends <WH7098> of the mercy-seat <WH3727>.

And make <WH6213> one <WH259> cherub <WH3742> at the one end <WH7098>, and one <WH259> cherub <WH3742> at the other <WH259> end <WH7098>: of one piece with the mercy-seat <WH3727> shall ye make <WH6213> the cherubim <WH3742> on the two <WH8147> ends thereof <WH7098>.

And the cherubim <WH3742> shall spread <WH6566> out their wings <WH3671> on high <WH4605>, covering <WH5526> the mercy-seat <WH3727> with their wings <WH3671>, with their faces <WH6440> one <WH376> to another <WH251>; toward the mercy-seat <WH3727> shall the faces <WH6440> of the cherubim be <WH3742>.
And thou shalt put <WH5414> the mercy-seat <WH3727> above <WH4605> upon the ark <WH727>; and in the ark <WH727> thou shalt put <WH5414> the testimony <WH5715> that I shall give thee <WH5414>.

And there I will meet <WH3259> with thee <WH1696>, and I will commune with thee from above the mercy-seat <WH3727>, from between <WH996> the two <WH8147> cherubim <WH3742> which are upon <WH5921> the ark <WH727> of the testimony <WH5715>, of all things which I will give thee in commandment <WH6680> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> a table <WH7979> of acacia <WH7848> wood <WH6086>: two cubits <WH520> shall be the length <WH753> thereof <WH520>, and a cubit the breadth <WH7341> thereof <WH520>, and a cubit and a half <WH2677> the height thereof <WH6967>.
And thou shalt overlay <WH6823> it with pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>, and make <WH6213> thereto a crown <WH2213> of gold <WH2091> round about <WH5439>.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> unto it a border <WH4526> of a handbreadth <WH2948> round about <WH5439>; and thou shalt make <WH6213> a golden <WH2091> crown <WH2213> to the border <WH4526> thereof round about <WH5439>.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> for it four <WH702> rings <WH2885> of gold <WH2091>, and put <WH5414> the rings <WH2885> in the four <WH702> corners <WH6285> that are on the four <WH702> feet thereof <WH7272>.
Close <WH5980> by the border <WH4526> shall the rings <WH2885> be <WH1004>, for places for the staves <WH905> to bear <WH5375> the table <WH7979>.
And thou shalt make <WH6213> the staves <WH905> of acacia <WH7848> wood <WH6086>, and overlay <WH6823> them with gold <WH2091>, that the table <WH7979> may be borne with them <WH5375>.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> the dishes <WH7086> thereof <WH3709>, and the spoons thereof <WH7184>, and the flagons thereof <WH4518>, and the bowls thereof <WH2004>, wherewith to pour <WH5258> out <WH2889>: of pure gold <WH2091> shalt thou make them <WH6213>.
And thou shalt set <WH5414> upon the table <WH7979> showbread <WH3899> before <WH6440> me alway <WH8548>.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> a candlestick <WH4501> of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>: of beaten work <WH4749> shall the candlestick <WH4501> be made <WH6213>, even its base <WH7070>, and its shaft <WH3409>; its cups <WH1375>, its knops <WH3730>, and its flowers <WH6525>, shall be of one piece with it:

and there shall be six <WH8337> branches <WH7070> going <WH3318> out of the sides <WH6654> thereof <WH7969>; three branches <WH7070> of the candlestick <WH4501> out of the one <WH259> side <WH6654> thereof <WH7969>, and three branches <WH7070> of the candlestick <WH4501> out of the other <WH8145> side thereof <WH6654>:

three <WH7969> cups <WH1375> made like almond-blossoms <WH8246> in one <WH259> branch <WH7070>, a knop <WH3730> and a flower <WH6525>; and three <WH7969> cups <WH1375> made like almond-blossoms <WH8246> in the other <WH259> branch <WH7070>, a knop <WH3730> and a flower <WH6525>: so for the six <WH8337> branches <WH7070> going <WH3318> out of the candlestick <WH4501>:
and in the candlestick <WH4501> four <WH702> cups <WH1375> made like almond-blossoms <WH8246>, the knops <WH3730> thereof <WH6525>, and the flowers thereof;

and a knop <WH3730> under two <WH8147> branches <WH7070> of one piece with it <WH3730>, and a knop under two <WH8147> branches <WH7070> of one piece with it <WH3730>, and a knop under two <WH8147> branches <WH7070> of one piece with it <WH8337>, for the six branches <WH7070> going <WH3318> out of the candlestick <WH4501>.
Their knops <WH3730> and their branches <WH7070> shall be of one piece with it <WH259>; the whole of it one beaten work <WH4749> of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091>.
And thou shalt make <WH6213> the lamps <WH5216> thereof <WH7651>, seven: and they shall light <WH5927> the lamps <WH5216> thereof <WH215>, to give light over against <WH5676> it <WH6440>.
And the snuffers <WH4457> thereof <WH4289>, and the snuffdishes thereof <WH2889>, shall be of pure gold <WH2091>.
Of a talent <WH3603> of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091> shall it be made <WH6213>, with all these vessels <WH3627>.
And see <WH7200> that thou make <WH6213> them after their pattern <WH8403>, which hath been showed <WH7200> thee in the mount <WH2022>.
